 2008-00542008-01-29,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of DOUGLAS I. KNOWLES of Vancouver, British Columbia, as a director of the Board of Directors of Ridley Terminals Inc., to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years, in the place of Susanne Stushnoff, effective April 13, 2008.
